description:
Super hydrating and glowboosting sheet mask enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Sakura to boost dull skin

Your skin looks dull and your complexion is uneven Ready set glow Mask up with our Super Hydrating GlowBoosting Sheet Mask to supercharge your skin with a bomb of hydration in just 15 minutes Infused with the quantity of one bottle of serum and enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Sakura to boost skins glow Applied to the face the sheet acts like a compress of hydration for your skin to deliver all its efficacy It is easy to apply and leaves you free to move around during the wait time This sheet mask is biodegradable by homecompost

PROVEN EFFICACY
After just 15 minutes
skin is intensely rehydrated
Skin is smoother and more luminous
Complexion is even and fresh
After 1 week
Skin looks healthy
Skin is replumped and more bouncy
Overall skin quality is improved

Instrumental test 24 volunteers Self assessment 54 women One single use After 3 applications per week

All Garnier products are officially approved by Cruelty Free International
Since 1989 Garnier has been committed to a world without animal testing

the sheet mask is compostable in homecompost conditions only Otherwise it should be discarded in general household waste Based on the amount of a 28ml bottle of serum

Infused with the quantity of one bottle of serum Based on the amount of a 28ml bottle of serum

Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Sakura to intensely rehydrate skin and to boost skins glow

Biodegradable by homecompost The sheet mask is compostable in homecompost conditions only Otherwise it should be discarded in general household waste

Suitable for sensitive skin

Vegan formula no animal derived ingredients or byproducts
name: Garnier Skinactive Hydra Bomb Tissue Face Mask Sakura Each
